timeline.message: Remove initMethod() from object type

timeline.bodyText: Shall we minimize the two returns to a single return statement?
timeline.author: nadeeshaan

timeline.bodyText: Shall we merge this with the wrapping if condition?

timeline.bodyText: Should this be a part of the SymbolFinder?
timeline.author: SupunS

replies.author: pubudu91

replies.bodyText:
In the AST we would know its a type-reference right?
for e.g.: in public void visit(BLangSimpleVariable varNode) {} method, we know what we need to return is a TypeReferenceTypeSymbol
replies.author: SupunS

replies.bodyText: Yeah, but the thing is, we return a BSymbol from the SymbolFinder, not the node.
replies.author: pubudu91
